StringTable.Label: Factions_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Assign leaders to work with various factions in your civilization in order to gain favor and procure from their abilities.

StringTable.Label: BATTLE_VIEWER_DISABLED_MP_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Battle Viewer is disabled in multiplayer.

StringTable.Label: LOGINTOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Login to enable multiplayer, achievements and mod support!

StringTable.Label: CIVILIZATIONNAMELABEL
StringTable.String: [B]Data Bank[/B][BR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]View the statistics of your civilization.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Opponents_Slots_Dec
StringTable.String: Choose the opponents and potential Allies you want to share the galaxy with.

StringTable.Label: LOBBY_INVITEFRIENDS_NOOVERLAY
StringTable.String: The Steam Overlay is disabled for this game. Please enable the Steam Overlay to invite friends.

StringTable.Label: Conquest_Description
StringTable.String: Crush your enemies and dominate the galaxy!

StringTable.Label: Alliance_Description
StringTable.String: Use diplomacy to bring peace to the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Description
StringTable.String: No need to fight when your civilization is the best.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Description
StringTable.String: Reclaim Ascension Crystals and ascend to a higher plane.

StringTable.Label: TurnLimit_Description
StringTable.String: Defeat your foes before time runs out.

StringTable.Label: Prestige_Description
StringTable.String: Build the greatest empire in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AllowSurrender_Description
StringTable.String: Your enemies will fight to the last breath.

StringTable.Label: BlindExploration_Description
StringTable.String: Do not show unknown stars on strategic map.

StringTable.Label: MegaEvents_Description
StringTable.String: Galaxy-wide Mega Events will not occur.

StringTable.Label: SuperAbilities_Description
StringTable.String: Players cannot use their Super Abilities.

StringTable.Label: TechBrokering_Description
StringTable.String: Players can only trade Known technologies.

StringTable.Label: NoFOWInTerritory_Description
StringTable.String: No Fog of War within your borders.

StringTable.Label: StartClose_Description
StringTable.String: Another civilization will likely start very close to you.

StringTable.Label: StartNearAIPlayer_Description
StringTable.String: You will start with at least one other civilization in your sector, space permitting.

StringTable.Label: DistancedFromOtherPlayers_Description
StringTable.String: Start alone in sectors smaller than medium, otherwise a maximum distance from other civilizations ensured.

StringTable.Label: StartAloneInSector_Description
StringTable.String: Guaranteed to start alone in a sector as long as there is room to place the other civilizations in other sectors.

StringTable.Label: RUNSTEAM_TOOLTIP_LABEL
StringTable.String: Your connection has failed. Please verify that Steam is running and you are in online mode to play.

StringTable.Label: RUNEPIC_TOOLTIP_LABEL
StringTable.String: Your connection is pending or failed. Check to see if there is a browser window in the background with the Epic Account Portal waiting for a response.

StringTable.Label: METAVERSE_OFFLINE
StringTable.String: Metaverse is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

StringTable.Label: METAVERSE_ONLINE
StringTable.String: Scroll through the Metaverse to see your stats.

StringTable.Label: MODS_OFFLINE
StringTable.String: Mod Manager is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

StringTable.Label: MOD_ITEM_REPORT
StringTable.String: Report this mod. Moderators will be notified and action may or may not be taken based on their evaluation.

StringTable.Label: MOD_ITEM_DOWNLOAD
StringTable.String: Download mod to your local machine.

StringTable.Label: RUNGOG_TOOLTIP_LABEL
StringTable.String: Your connection has failed. Please verify that GOG Galaxy is running and you are online to play.

StringTable.Label: LOBBYENTRY_ADDBUTTON_DISABLED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Only the host can add AI players.

StringTable.Label: LOBBYENTRY_CLAIMBUTTON_DISABLED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Other players can claim this Civilization to play as them.

StringTable.Label: LOBBYENTRY_CLAIMBUTTON_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: To play as this Civilization, claim them for yourself.

StringTable.Label: OPTIONS_HOOKSENABLED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Allows applications such as AMD's Raptor software and nVidia's ShadowPlay to "hook" into GalCiv4 and record videos or screenshots. May cause instability if enabled.

StringTable.Label: GRAPHICS_CONFIRM_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Keep these changes? Your display will reset in %i seconds.

StringTable.Label: GRAPHICS_RESTART_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Your graphics options will take effect when you restart Galactic Civilizations IV.

StringTable.Label: LANGUAGE_RESTART_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: You must restart Galactic Civilizations IV for the new language setting to take effect.

StringTable.Label: OptionNotSupported
StringTable.String: This option is not supported by your computer.

StringTable.Label: ALFHA_WARNING_BUTTON_LABEL
StringTable.String: Work in progress, got it - let's go play space emperor!

StringTable.Label: CHOOSE_HOME_WORLD_TEXT
StringTable.String: This freighter is being launched from a shipyard with multiple sponsors. Choose its homeworld.

StringTable.Label: ExecutiveActions
StringTable.String: Executive Orders[BR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Direct your civilization's resources for immediate benefit.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ADMINISTRATION_MAINWND_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Used administrators out of total available.

StringTable.Label: ADMINISTRATION_NOT_ENOUGH_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Need more Administrators to build a new starbase.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_ECONOMIC_STIMULUS_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Pumping out consumer goods from our factories encourages economic activity, and therefore the growth of our treasury.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_RESEARCH_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Dedicating all our manufacturing facilities to the cause of a particularly important research project greatly increases the efficiency of our scientists.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_CULTURAL_FESTIVAL_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: A planet-wide celebration of our culture, dedicated to spreading our influence across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_BIRTHING_SUBSIDIES_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: A new colony often needs help growing. By diverting our manufacturing resources to helping families secure their environments, we can make sure they grow and prosper.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_JUBILEE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: A planet-wide celebration meant to bring hope back to the overworked population, and raise the colony's approval.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_ASSEMBLY_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Factories are more than a means of production; they are the nests from which we are born, and the wombs of future generations.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_MILITARY_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: When are no Planetary Improvements to build or upgrade, this allows a colony to funnel all its excess improvement construction to its shipyard.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_MORAL_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Allows a colony to funnel its improvement construction into boosting the morale of its population via free and cheaper goods and services.

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_LACKS_PROPULSION_MODULE
StringTable.String: This starbase has no propulsion system.

StringTable.Label: Hypergate_No_Link_Tooltip
StringTable.String: {OBJECTNAME:1} is not linked to another stream.

StringTable.Label: Hypergate_Connections_Tooltip
StringTable.String: The following streams have linked to {OBJECTNAME:1}:

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_DEFAULT_CONSTRUCTOR_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Select the Constructor Design, check this box, then hit Done to mark the selected design as the default constructor for all new starbases.

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_DEFAULT_CONSTRUCTOR_DETAILED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Select the Constructor Design, check this box, then hit Done to mark the selected design as the default constructor for all new starbases.[BR][BR]Current Default: %s

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_AUTOMATE_LABEL
StringTable.String: Automatically order upgrades for installed modules

StringTable.Label: InvaderRankDescription
StringTable.String: Invasion Rank is calculated from the Resolve of the invading soldiers.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_CONFIRM_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Are you sure you want to execute an invasion upon this planet?

StringTable.Label: ATTACKER_SUCCESS_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Good job, your invasion went great.

StringTable.Label: ATTACKER_FAILURE_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Ya blew it! Your invasion has failed.

StringTable.Label: DEFENDER_SUCCESS_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: You fended off the planetary invasion.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Research_Tooltip

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Production_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Percentage of production dedicated to building improvements and ships.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Manufacturing_Tooltip

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Social_Manufacturing_Tooltip

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Welth_Icon_Tooltip

StringTable.Label: DIPLOWND_CANCELED_TRADE
StringTable.String: I'm done with you. Go away now.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_CLASS_DEAD
StringTable.String: A dead world, devoid of life.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_CLASS_COLONIZABLE
StringTable.String: A world barely able to sustain life.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_CLASS_GOOD
StringTable.String: Ideal for any type of colony.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_CLASS_FANTASTIC
StringTable.String: Planets of this quality are rare.

StringTable.Label: BuildError_UnusableTerrain
StringTable.String: Terrain at tile is not yet usable.

StringTable.Label: BuildError_BlockedImpType
StringTable.String: Cannot build this improvement type on this terrain.

StringTable.Label: BuildError_MissingPlanetFeature
StringTable.String: Improvement is missing required tile feature.

StringTable.Label: BuildError_BlockedPlanetFeature
StringTable.String: Improvement cannot be built on this type of tile.

StringTable.Label: LevelPreviewOptionTooltip
StringTable.String: What level to show a preview of when the improvement doesn't have a level. If set to 0, the level preview will not be shown.

StringTable.Label: APPROVAL_TOOLTIP_YELLOW_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=Yellow]This planet's Approval is moderate, which is causing negative effects on the population. To increase Approval, specialize some citizens into Entertainers, and build more Approval Improvements or Starbase Modules.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: APPROVAL_TOOLTIP_RED_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]Approval is dangerously low, which is reducing the colony's efficiency and making the colony vulnerable to foreign influence. To increase Approval, build Morale Improvements or Starbase Modules.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GROWTH_TOOLTIP_YELLOW_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=Yellow]At current growth rates, the population of this planet will soon exceed the food supply. Build more Food Producing Improvements to assure continued growth.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GROWTH_TOOLTIP_RED_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]The population of this planet is being limited by inadequate housing. Construct housing districts to increase your population capacity.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GROWTH_TOOLTIP_BLACK_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]There isn't enough food in your civilization to sustain the population of this planet. Increase your food income to address this shortage.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_YELLOW_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=Yellow]A foreign power is now exerting a dangerous level of Influence on this planet. To avoid a rebellion, build more Influence and Resistance Improvements.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_RED_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]Foreign Influence on this world has become so high that the population has begun to rebel. If you do not act, the planet will soon defect. To quell the coming rebellion, build Influence improvements, or remove nearby foreign Starbase or Planets.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_RED_NOTIFICATION_TEXT_FOREIGN_PLANET
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]Foreign Influence on this world has become so high that the population has begun to rebel.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: USEGOVERNOR_BUTTON_ALREADYSELECTED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: This governor is already selected for this colony.

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGNER_BTN_SAVEAS

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGNER_BTN_REMOVE
StringTable.String: Remove the part from the ship.

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGNER_BTN_OBSOLETE

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGNER_BTN_PLACE

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGNER_BTN_UNGROUP
StringTable.String: Ungroup the currently selected part group.

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGNER_BTN_FAVORITE
StringTable.String: Add the selected part to the favorites list.

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGNER_NO_HULL_WARNING
StringTable.String: Must select a hull for the ship.

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGNER_SELECTING_NEW_HULL
StringTable.String: Selecting a new hull will cause you to lose your existing ship components and their placement. Is this ok?

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGNER_NAME_PART_TITLE
StringTable.String: Enter a name for the new part.

StringTable.Label: Click_to_Remap
StringTable.String: Press a new key to remap.

StringTable.Label: SHIP_DESIGN_CANNOT_REMOVE
StringTable.String: You cannot remove this component because other components are attached to it. You need to remove the attached components before removing this component.

StringTable.Label: USE_CONFIRM_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Core ships are not fully editable in Beta. Use anyway?

StringTable.Label: DESIGNER_MAX_CAPACITY_BODY_LABEL
StringTable.String: This part is too heavy to mount. Remove some other components first.

StringTable.Label: GOVERN_ASSIGN
StringTable.String: [B]Assign Governor[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Assigning a governor to this planet will allow you to manage it directly and build improvements on it.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Military_Advisor_Text
StringTable.String: 'If we are to colonize the galaxy, we will need Colony Ships to carry our people safely to those distant worlds.'

StringTable.Label: SHIPYARD_IDLE_ENTRY_DESCRIPTION_LABEL
StringTable.String: Set to Idle. Shipyard will auto-pass until given further orders.

StringTable.Label: SHIPYARD_SPONSOR_CONFIRM_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Shipyard will have no Sponsor. Continue?

StringTable.Label: PRIMED_UP_BODY_LABEL
StringTable.String: The United Planets will be gathering in %d months.

StringTable.Label: Turn_Limit_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: The player with the highest average percentage will win the game if no other victory type has been achieved.

StringTable.Label: Conquest_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Prove your military superiority by destroying or forcing the surrender of all the major Civilizations in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Conquest_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: You must defeat %i remaining Civilizations to achieve a conquest victory.

StringTable.Label: Tech_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Earn the keys to a higher plane of existence by unlocking the ultimate technologies.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Capture and study Precursor Ascension Crystals to learn the secret to ascending to a higher level of existence.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: You have %i of the %i Aura points required to achieve an ascension victory.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Requirement_2_Label
StringTable.String: You must control the majority of Ascension Crystals in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Diplomatic_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Form a permanent alliance with all remaining major Civilizations, and bring true peace to the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Diplomatic_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: You must ally with %i more Civilizations to achieve an alliance victory.

StringTable.Label: United_Planets_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Convince the United Planets to elect you Supreme Leader of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: United_Planets_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: Approximately %i%% of the United Planets' Civilizations are currently willing to vote for you as Supreme Leader.

StringTable.Label: United_Planets_Requirement_2_Label
StringTable.String: %i Major Civilizations have defied the U.P. and must be destroyed to achieve a United Planets Victory.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Spread your cultural influence throughout %i%% of the galaxy, and become the unquestioned dominate culture.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: Your cultural influence must still gain control of %i%% of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Requirement_2_Label
StringTable.String: You must hold control for %i more [HS=HS_Week]Months[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Influence_Requirement_3_Label
StringTable.String: At peace with all major Civilizations

StringTable.Label: LOBBY_CREATION_FAILED_GAME_STARTED
StringTable.String: Lobby enter failed, game already started.

StringTable.Label: HOST_DISCONNECTED_LOBBY
StringTable.String: Host disconnected. Lobby closed. Please try another lobby or start a New Session.

StringTable.Label: PEER_DISCONNECTED
StringTable.String: Peer disconnected. The host may (Restore Session) from the (Multiplayer) screen and continue game from the last save. Attempting to replace player with AI.

StringTable.Label: EXPECTED_MESSAGE_COUNT
StringTable.String: Expected message count mismatch. The host may (Restore Session) from the (Multiplayer) screen and continue game from the last save.

StringTable.Label: CHECKSUM_MISMATCH_PEER
StringTable.String: Checksum mismatch detected. Please send the zip file from your My Games/GalCiv4/Debug to the developers. The host may restore the session from the Multiplayer screen and continue the game from the last save.

StringTable.Label: CHECKSUM_MISMATCH_HOST
StringTable.String: Checksum mismatch detected. Please send the zip file from your My Games/GalCiv4/Debug folder to the developers. Try restoring the session from the Multiplayer screen and continue from the last save.

StringTable.Label: DESYNC
StringTable.String: Your client has gotten out of sync with the host. The host may (Restore Session) from the (Multiplayer) screen and continue game from the last save.

StringTable.Label: OBJECT_DESYNC
StringTable.String: An Object Desync has been detected. This may cause a stuck turn or crash. The host may (Restore Session) from the (Multiplayer) screen and continue game from the last save.

StringTable.Label: PEER_TO_PEER_CONNECTION_FAILED
StringTable.String: Peer-to-peer connection failed. The host may (Restore Session) from the (Multiplayer) screen and continue game from the last save. Attempting to replace player with AI.

StringTable.Label: PEER_TO_PEER_CONNECTION_FAILED_NOT_RUNNING_APP
StringTable.String: Peer-to-peer connection failed: Error - not running app. The host may (Restore Session) from the (Multiplayer) screen and continue game from the last save. Attempting to replace player with AI.

StringTable.Label: PEER_TO_PEER_CONNECTION_FAILED_NO_RIGHTS_TO_APP
StringTable.String: Peer-to-peer connection failed: Error - no rights to app. The host may (Restore Session) from the (Multiplayer) screen and continue game from the last save. Attempting to replace player with AI.

StringTable.Label: PEER_TO_PEER_CONNECTION_FAILED_DESTINATION_NOT_LOGGED_IN
StringTable.String: Peer-to-peer connection failed: Destination not logged in. The host may (Restore Session) from the (Multiplayer) screen and continue game from the last save. Attempting to replace player with AI.

StringTable.Label: DXDiagErrorBelowMinResolution
StringTable.String: Your desktop resolution is currently set to %d x %d. The minimum supported resolution for %s is %ld x %ld. Right-click on your desktop and choose Properties, and then click on the Settings tab to adjust your desktop resolution.

StringTable.Label: DXDiagErrorBelowMinColorDepth
StringTable.String: Your desktop color depth is currently set to %d bit. %s runs best in 32-bit color. To change your desktop color, right-click on your desktop and choose Properties, and then click on the Settings tab.

StringTable.Label: DXDiagErrorBelowMinVRAM
StringTable.String: This video card is reporting less than %ld MB of Video RAM. It may not be able to run %s.

StringTable.Label: DXDiagErrorOldDriver
StringTable.String: Your video drivers may be too old to run %s properly. Installed video drivers must support Microsoft DirectX 10.1, which means you should try to have a driver from at least 2013 installed. Please visit the website for your computer manufacturer or video card for more recent drivers. Your computer manufacturer was reported to be %s. Your video card manufacturer was reported to be %s. Reported driver date: %s

StringTable.Label: DXDiagErrorNoDXAcceleration
StringTable.String: WARNING: DirectX Acceleration is not enabled. You may experience difficulties running.

StringTable.Label: NotEnoughVirtualMemory
StringTable.String: WARNING: Your system virtual memory page file is only %I64d MB. This is below the recommended %I64d MB. Your game may run out of memory during gameplay and crash. Please try increasing your page file size and restart the game.

StringTable.Label: PageFileDisabled
StringTable.String: WARNING: Your system virtual memory page file has been disabled. The recommended page file size is %I64d MB. Your game may run out of memory during gameplay and crash. Please enable your page file and restart the game.

StringTable.Label: EXIT_SHIP_DESIGNER_CONFIRM_MESSAGE

StringTable.Label: SnathiLostScoutAnomoly_Dec
StringTable.String: Upon reaching the Terran ship we have found that it is mostly intact. Our Scavenging crew has been able to get it up and running in a remarkably short time. It seems once the crew was dead, the energy field that had trapped it dissipated.

StringTable.Label: TREATY_DESCRIPTION_DECLAREWAR

StringTable.Label: TREATY_DESCRIPTION_CULTURAL

StringTable.Label: TREATY_DESCRIPTION_FREETRADE

StringTable.Label: TREATY_DESCRIPTION_ResearchTradeTreaty

StringTable.Label: TREATY_DESCRIPTION_STRATEGICRESOURCE

StringTable.Label: OutreachTier_Dec
StringTable.String: Benevolent civilizations believe that they can peacefully explore and colonize the galaxy, and Outreach gives them the tools they need to do it.

StringTable.Label: AffinityTier_Dec
StringTable.String: Through a profound affinity with their people and the Civilizations they encounter, benevolent Civilizations can avoid almost all internal strife.

StringTable.Label: ProminenceTier_Dec
StringTable.String: Persuasion is one of the primary ways a benevolent Civilization uses to resolve conflict with others and even expand their influence throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: EnlightenmentTier_Dec
StringTable.String: The Enlightenment of its citizens is always helpful to a benevolent Civilization, helping them keep ahead of the less tolerant Civilizations of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: OUTREACH2_POPUP_MESSAGE

StringTable.Label: OUTREACH5_POPUP_MESSAGE

StringTable.Label: AWETRAIT4_POPUP_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: This world has joined our empire!

StringTable.Label: STARTUP_DESCRIPTION_DEFAULT
StringTable.String: The Drengin Empire is one of the older Civilizations in the galaxy, having survived and thrived over the millennia thanks to their unceasing brutality. Not mindlessly evil, as many Civilizations have discovered to their dismay, the Drengin are exceedingly clever and inventive in their application of evil. There are few ways to enslave or devour an alien that the Drengin haven't thought up.[BR][BR]Following the Dread Lord Wars, the Drengin were forced to put down an internal rebellion by a Civilization of Drengin called the Korath. That done, though not without cost, they remain one of the dominant species in the galaxy, along with their uneasy allies, the Yor.

StringTable.Label: STARTUP_TRAITSDESCRIPTION_DEFAULT
StringTable.String: Drengin soldiers are savagely effective in ground-based combat, and their naval vessels are famously tough. Their military manufacturing ability is also impressive, but Drengin colonies do sometimes struggle with discontent. Much of their famous inventiveness is put into stopping slaveling revolts.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_01_Description
StringTable.String: We've been attacked. We don't know by who, or what they want, but they're here. They want us dead. They want our land and our resources. We have to stop them, or lose everything.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_01_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: We've been attacked. We don't know by who, or what they want, but they're here. They want us dead. They want our land and our resources. We have to stop them, or lose everything.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_02_Description
StringTable.String: Our counter-offensive has begun. We attack their quadrant of space. Everything we have is headed there, and we want you to command our forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_02_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: Our counter-offensive has begun. We attack their quadrant of space. Everything we have is headed there, and we want you to command our forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_03_Description
StringTable.String: We're hearing news of an attack on our home worlds. Stop them at all costs.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_03_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: We're hearing news of an attack on our home worlds. Stop them at all costs.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_02_Scenario_01_Description
StringTable.String: Simple standalone scenario to try your hand at defeating difficult forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_02_Scenario_01_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: Simple standalone scenario to try your hand at defeating difficult forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_03_Scenario_01_Description
StringTable.String: This is a long battle against multiple enemies in a large map. Actually, it isn't any of these things.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_03_Scenario_01_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: This is a long battle against multiple enemies in a large map. Actually, it isn't any of these things.

StringTable.Label: STARTBTNTOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Game must have 2+ players with at least one player not on the same team as other players, and all humans must click Ready.

StringTable.Label: PASSWORDLABEL
StringTable.String: Does this game require a password?

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN_NOHUMANPLAYER_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: No human players available for this scenario.

StringTable.Label: CONVENTIONAL_WARFARE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: This is war in its purest form, two forces fighting it out, often one-on-one in the streets. Not the easiest way to take a planet, but often the only way.

StringTable.Label: INFORMATION_WARFARE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Very expensive, but useful if you want to preserve a planet intact and with a surviving population to keep things running.

StringTable.Label: BIOLOGICAL_WARFARE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: When you only want the infrastructure but not all those troublesome inhabitants.

StringTable.Label: PLANETARY_BOMBARDMENT_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Hurtling nearby asteroids onto the planet surface weakens resolve but will result in an unhappy population later. However, it is relatively inexpensive.

StringTable.Label: TIDAL_DISRUPTION_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: This very expensive option does less damage and stuns the remaining population into submission.

StringTable.Label: CORE_DETONATION_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Expensive alternative to planetary bombardment, leaves population shell shocked and submissive afterwards but results in massive planetary damage.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Aggressive
StringTable.String: They tend to look for excuses to go to war. Be careful.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Peaceful
StringTable.String: More likely to select a moderate response to diplomatic slights; and emphasize things in common to promote harmony.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Cruel
StringTable.String: Tendency to pick on weaker civilizations, and cares less about cultural animosity.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Expansionist
StringTable.String: Prioritizes opportunities to expand their empire.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Greedy
StringTable.String: Prioritizes opportunities to increase their treasury by any means.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Opportunistic
StringTable.String: If they see weakness, they will take advantage of the opportunity.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Cultural
StringTable.String: Values things that increase their influence in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Spiritual
StringTable.String: Places increased importance on ideological choices.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Totalitarianism
StringTable.String: Believes in absolute power and control by the state, with all aspects of public and private life under the governance of a single authority.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Nihilism
StringTable.String: Believes in the rejection or denial of inherent meaning or value in life, often extending to concepts such as morality, religion, and purpose.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Collectivism
StringTable.String: Believes in prioritizing the collective good of multi-species societies, star systems, or entire sectors, often emphasizing shared responsibility and collective action in galactic affairs.

StringTable.Label: PePersonalityType_Desc_Progressivism
StringTable.String: Believes in the relentless pursuit of technological advancement and societal reform, often with a focus on universal equality across species and planetary systems.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Egalitarianism
StringTable.String: Believes in the fundamental equality of all sentient beings, advocating for equal rights and opportunities regardless of species, origin planet, or other characteristics.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Traditionalism
StringTable.String: Believes in the importance of preserving established customs, practices, and institutions and views societal change with caution.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Individualism
StringTable.String: Believes in the primacy of individual rights, personal freedom, and self-reliance, often over the needs and interests of the community or society.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Pacifism
StringTable.String: Believes in opposing war and violence, advocating for the resolution of conflicts through peaceful negotiations and mutual respect.

StringTable.Label: AIPriority_Desc_Diplomacy
StringTable.String: Non-war interactions with other Civilizations and the United Planets.

StringTable.Label: AIPriority_Desc_Influence
StringTable.String: Expansion of ZOC and cultural takeover.

StringTable.Label: AIPriority_Desc_Logistics
StringTable.String: Size of fleets that can be assembled.

StringTable.Label: LOADING_INITIAL_CHECKSUM
StringTable.String: Creating simulated universe within simulated universe...

StringTable.Label: Ship_Behavior_Label
StringTable.String: Ship Role determines how this ship will behave in combat, and how it will interact with other ships in your fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Capital
StringTable.String: In battle, capital ships are the steel heart of your fleet. They will target any ship that comes in range, with the primary goal of cutting to the heart of the enemy fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Escort
StringTable.String: In battle, escorts will try to defend high-value ships like capital and support ships. If they have no assets to defend, they will target enemy ships, preferring medium threat ships like assault craft.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Assault
StringTable.String: In battle, assault craft are your sword. Their goal is to dive into the heart of a battle and take out the high-value, high-threat targets, such as capital ships.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Bomber
StringTable.String: In battle, assault craft are your sword. Their goal is to dive into the heart of a battle and take out the high-value, high-threat targets, such as capital ships.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Interceptor
StringTable.String: In battle, interceptors will try to seek out and destroy high-value, low fortitude targets, with the primary goal of taking out enemy support ships as quickly as possible.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Guardian
StringTable.String: In battle, guardians will try to defend low fortitude, high-value targets such as support ships. They will never surrender this duty as long as their charges remain.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Support
StringTable.String: In battle, support ships will attempt to stay out of combat. If armed, they will target any nearby threats, with a preference for low fortitude targets such as interceptors.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Starbase
StringTable.String: Starbases stay put and attempt to fight off any threats.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Upgrading
StringTable.String: Upgrading ships will stay put and attempt to fight off any threats.

StringTable.Label: RUSH_REQUIREMENTS_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Spend resources to instantly finish current construction.

StringTable.Label: AI_DIFFICULTIES_RESET_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: All AI have been set to the %s difficulty.

StringTable.Label: GalaxyViewZoomLevel_ToolTip
StringTable.String: When to transition star clusters into more simplified information in galactic view.

StringTable.Label: GROWTH_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Growth comes from the non-synthetic citizens on your world. But it can be increased by improvements like Fertility Clinics and Hospitals and significantly decreased on worlds with high pollution.

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_COLONY_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Influence controls how far your borders spread. Once borders collide, low Influence worlds may culture flip to the control of a civilization with higher Influence.

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_STARBASE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Build Influence modules on this starbase to help grow its influence more quickly.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_CLASS_TOOLTIP_BOTTOM_TEXT
StringTable.String: Build Terraforming improvements on this planet to increase planet class.

StringTable.Label: SAVE_DISABLED_MOVING
StringTable.String: Please wait until ship movement, battle, invasion, and colonization are resolved.

StringTable.Label: SAVE_LOAD_EXIT_DISABLED_AI_RUNNING
StringTable.String: Please wait for the other players turns to finish.

StringTable.Label: LOAD_DISABLED_MULTIPLAYER
StringTable.String: To restore a multiplayer session, go to Multiplayer from the Main Menu and select 'Restore Session'.

StringTable.Label: CIVILIZATIONCAPITAL_TOOLTIP_DEC
StringTable.String: The heart of your civilization, its growth and its power.

StringTable.Label: CanSupplySocial_Value
StringTable.String: Hauls refined goods to another colony providing %ld manufacturing points.

StringTable.Label: CanSupplyMilitary_Value
StringTable.String: Hauls refined goods to another shipyard providing %ld manufacturing points.

StringTable.Label: CUSTOM_FACTION_WND_SAVE_FAILED_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Unable to save the custom Civilization file. Try naming the Civilization differently, or make sure you are able to create files in your Documents/My Games/GalCiv4/Factions folder.

StringTable.Label: CUSTOM_FACTION_WND_EDIT_SAVE_FAILED_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Unable to save the custom Civilization file. Please make sure you are able to create files in your Documents/My Games/GalCiv4/Factions folder.

StringTable.Label: SHIPDESIGNOPTION_RESTART_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: You must start a new game for the Show All Ship Designs option to take effect.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_GOTO_BUTTON_LABEL
StringTable.String: [B]Go To[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Send the fleet to a specific location.[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Hotkey: Right-Click[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DEFY_UP_CONFIRM_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Are you sure you want to defy the U.P.? There may be 'consequences.'

StringTable.Label: SupremeLeader_Dec
StringTable.String: One Civilization shall forever rule the Galaxy.

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanets_Description
StringTable.String: Convince the United Planets to name you Supreme Leader.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_ForeignInZOC
StringTable.String: There are %ld foreign ships in your territory without open borders.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_IdeologyPointAvailable
StringTable.String: You have enough culture points to add a new trait to your civilization.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_LeaderAvailable
StringTable.String: A Leader is available to be assigned.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_Starvation
StringTable.String: You do not have enough food, your citizens are starving.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_OtherBuildingTechVictory
StringTable.String: %s is building %s on %s in preparation for a tech victory.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_OtherCloseToAscension
StringTable.String: %s is %ld points away from an ascension victory.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_OtherCloseToInfluenceVictory
StringTable.String: %s is %ld turns away from an Influence Victory.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_UPGoingToMeet
StringTable.String: The United Planets will be meeting in %ld turns.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_StoleCreditsFromRace
StringTable.String: Our Diplomat %s has stolen %.0f credits from the %s.

StringTable.Label: GALAXYSETTINGS_MINSPEC_GALAXYSIZE
StringTable.String: %s maps require %.1fGB of physical memory (RAM). You currently have %.1fGB available.

StringTable.Label: GALAXYSETTINGS_POPUP_ADJUSTPLAYERS_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Would you like to change the number of opponents to better match the map size?

StringTable.Label: GALAXYSETTINGS_DISABLED_IN_GAME_MODE_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: This option is disabled in the current game mode.

StringTable.Label: TECHAGE_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Each technology provides the needed infrastructure to allow your civilization to progress towards the next technological age.

StringTable.Label: CONVERSATION_POPUP_MINOR_TITLE
StringTable.String: A Minor Civilization Has Contacted Us

StringTable.Label: MOVE_FLEET_OUT_OF_RANGE
StringTable.String: This destination is outside the fleet's range.

StringTable.Label: MOVE_SHIPYARD_OUT_OF_RANGE
StringTable.String: This destination is outside the shipyard's range.

StringTable.Label: MOVE_STARBASE_OUT_OF_RANGE
StringTable.String: This destination is outside the starbase's range.

StringTable.Label: RAZECOLONY_VERIFY_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Destroying %s will also make the planet unusable for future colonization. Are you sure you want to do this?

StringTable.Label: GovernPlanetWnd_CantDestroy_Tooltip
StringTable.String: You cannot destroy your last colony.

StringTable.Label: RETIRE_MP_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: You cannot retire from multiplayer games. You may click Main Menu or Exit to allow the AI to assume control instead.

StringTable.Label: RETIRE_CONFIRM_MSG
StringTable.String: Retiring will cause you to forfeit the game. Are you sure you want to retire?

StringTable.Label: DURANTIUM_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Enormously strong and pliable, Durantium is required for most orbital improvements.

StringTable.Label: PROMETHION_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Promethion is a requirement for many advanced planetary improvements. Thanks to its bizarre quantum nature, existing in multiple realities at the same time, Promethion is a necessary ingredient in any well-equipped lab.

StringTable.Label: THULIUM_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Thulium possesses an unusual ability to vary its density, making it incredibly valuable for kinetic weapons, as well as a prized building material.

StringTable.Label: ELERIUM_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: The massive amounts of energy needed for advanced beam weapons require specialized Elerium crystals to safely channel.

StringTable.Label: ANTIMATTER_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: One of the most reliable high-density sources of energy in the galaxy, Antimatter is used in both power generation systems and advanced missile platforms.

StringTable.Label: CULTURE_RELIC_TOOLTIP_DESC_MSG
StringTable.String: Culture Relics increase colony and starbase influence growth.

StringTable.Label: ECONOMIC_RELIC_TOOLTIP_DESC_MSG
StringTable.String: Economic Relics increase colony gross income.

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_EFFECTS_AVAILABLE_COLONY_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Build an Economic or Cultural Ring to start applying bonuses to this colony.

StringTable.Label: EJECTMODE_CHOOSEDESTINATION
StringTable.String: Right-click a destination, or ctrl-select more ships

StringTable.Label: PLAYERACHIEVEMENT_HSTEXT
StringTable.String: Only one of this improvement can be built per civilization.

StringTable.Label: COLONYUNIQUE_HSTEXT
StringTable.String: Only one of this improvement can be built on this core world.

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_PASS_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Pass[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Take no action, and remove from idle ship list for this turn.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_CONSTRUCTSTARBASE_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Construct Starbase[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Consume a constructor module to build a starbase at this location.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_CONSTRUCTSHIPYARD_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Construct Shipyard[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Consume a constructor module to build a shipyard at this location.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_UPGRADE_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Upgrade[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Add a component to a leveled-up ship.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_SURVEY_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Survey[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Will attempt to find and go to anomalies.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_AUTOCOLONIZE_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Auto Colonize[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Will attempt to colonize the most attractive known planet, or find some to colonize.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_AUTOMINE_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Auto Mine[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Will attempt to establish a mining base at a nearby asteroid, if available.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_EXPLORE_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Explore[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Will attempt to clear the fog of war.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_SENTRY_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Sentry[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Order the ship to remain here (skipping its turns). It will only reactivate if an enemy ship comes within sensor range.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_STANDBY_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Standby[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Order the ship to remain here (skipping its turns). It will remain inactive and unresponsive until told otherwise.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_REPAIR_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Repair[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Will gain a repair speed boost, and notify you when it is back to full strength.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_RALLY_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Send to Destination[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Send fleet to a rally point or other map object.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: SAVEORSEND3DPRINT_INFO_1
StringTable.String: You may either export your design locally or print it using a 3D printing service.

StringTable.Label: SAVEORSEND3DPRINT_INFO_2
StringTable.String: Exporting locally saves a local copy of your ship design (OBJ file format). You can use the file on your own 3D printer.

StringTable.Label: SAVEORSEND3DPRINT_INFO_3
StringTable.String: Alternately, you may export your ship design to a third party service to 3D print your design.

StringTable.String: This planet belongs to a Pre-Hyperspace Civilization and cannot communicate with us.

StringTable.Label: MAINGAME_RESEARCH_BUTTON_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Tell your researchers what technologies to focus on.

StringTable.Label: MINOR_CIV_TRADING_WITH_US
StringTable.String: This minor civilization is in our sphere of influence and is trading its Resource outputs with us.

StringTable.Label: MINOR_CIV_TRADING_WITH_OTHER
StringTable.String: This minor civilization is in another civilization's sphere of influence and is trading its Resource outputs with them.

StringTable.Label: MINOR_CIV_NOT_TRADING
StringTable.String: This minor civilization will provide its Resource outputs to the civilization whose sphere of influence it is in.

StringTable.Label: Research_Candidates_Title
StringTable.String: Our scientists have special insight into these technology candidates - [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]100% Research Bonus[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: POWER_BAR_NO_KNOWN_FACTIONS
StringTable.String: Search out other civilizations to compare your faction power to theirs.

StringTable.Label: SUMMARY_TAB_COREWORLDS_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: This is a count of the Core Worlds your Civilization controls.[BR][BR]Core Worlds are planets with a Governor assigned that can be improved and support a Shipyard. A planet must be Class 10 or greater to be converted into a Core World.

StringTable.Label: SUMMARY_TAB_COLONIES_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: This is a count of the Colonies your Civilization controls.[BR][BR]A colony is any planet that has been colonized and is not managed by a Governor. Colonies provide additional Input to the nearest Core World to improve the Core World's Output.

StringTable.Label: SUMMARY_TAB_POPULATION_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: This is a count of the Citizens in your civilization.[BR][BR]Citizens are available from Core Worlds. Citizens improve the Core World's Output and are required by Colony Ships constructed at the Shipyard to colonize new planets.

StringTable.Label: SUMMARY_TAB_RANKING_PRODUCTION_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: You are ranked #%lu in Manufacturing Capacity.

StringTable.Label: SUMMARY_TAB_RANKING_RESEARCH_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: You are ranked #%lu in Research Capacity.

StringTable.Label: SUMMARY_TAB_RANKING_MILITARY_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: You are ranked #%lu for Military Might.

StringTable.Label: BetaDialog
StringTable.String: Welcome to the Founder's preview of Crusade! We welcome your feedback on the Founders' forums. Yet, please do not share screenshots or other information with the wider world.[BR][BR]Thank you and enjoy conquering the galaxy!

StringTable.Label: Policy_Description_Title_Text
StringTable.String: Enact policies to shape your civilization

StringTable.Label: Available_PolicySlotTooltip
StringTable.String: Select an available policy on the right to enact

StringTable.Label: Locked_PolicySlotTooltip
StringTable.String: Research technologies to unlock more slots

StringTable.Label: Error_MaxEnactedPolicies
StringTable.String: You have enacted the maximum number of policies. Repeal a policy to enact this policy.

StringTable.Label: Self_BlockDiplomats_Tooltip
StringTable.String: You cannot assign diplomats while the Block Embassies policy is enacted.

StringTable.Label: Placeing_Agents_Note_Title
StringTable.String: [ICON=DefendingAgent_Icon] Placing Spies on Planetary Improvements will disable them.[BR][ICON=ShipsDefendingWorldIcon] You can nullify defending Spies using your own spies, destroying both Agents.

StringTable.Label: Espionage_Agent_Placement_Note_Title
StringTable.String: You can use Spies to destabilize the Improvements and kill enemy Citizen. To place a Spy on a planet, select the target planet and choose 'Place Spy'.

StringTable.Label: MINOR_NO_ESPIONAGE
StringTable.String: There is no point spying on this pre-Hyperspace society. We can, however, abduct their people and probe them if you'd like.

StringTable.Label: ShipyardConstruction_Desc
StringTable.String: Manufacturing used to build ships at shipyards.

StringTable.Label: IMPROVEMENT_DISABLED
StringTable.String: Improvements with a negative level are disabled. Raise their level with adjacent improvements to activate them.

StringTable.Label: Alert_HyperlaneBuilt
StringTable.String: Somewhere a subspace stream has been built...

StringTable.Label: PLANET_TOOLTIP_FULL_SOCIAL_MANUFACTURING
StringTable.String: Command your shipyard to construct a ship.

StringTable.String: Select an improvement to place your spy

StringTable.Label: REMOVING_WOULD_MAKE_NEGATIVE
StringTable.String: This leader is unable to leave their post as it would result in dire consequences.

StringTable.Label: Diplomacy_DiplomatsChanged
StringTable.String: Recent assignments will take effect next turn.

StringTable.Label: MainGameWnd_TurnButton_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Press [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Tab[/COLOR] to advance to next turn.

StringTable.Label: Crusade_Training_Header_Title
StringTable.String: Choose an area of specialization for this citizen

StringTable.Label: Crusade_Training_Header_Title_None_Available
StringTable.String: You have no citizens to train

StringTable.Label: Overview_Civilization_Description_Title_Tooltip
StringTable.String: The AI uses this sentence and the culture selections to generate a backstory.

StringTable.Label: Custom_Faction_Style_Text
StringTable.String: Customize the Ship and save the Ship templates used by your Civilizations Ship Style. Drag and Drop any combatable template to any Ship Class to change it.

StringTable.Label: Crusade_Upload_Ship_Style_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Upload this Ship Style to the Ship Styles category of the Workshop. If this Ship Style is part of a Civilization you are creating, the ship style will automatically be included with the Civilization.

StringTable.Label: Crusade_Get_Ships_Text
StringTable.String: Browse thousands of ships in the Workshop and build your own Custom Fleet Styles.

StringTable.Label: CustomFaction_SaveShipStylePrompt_Message
StringTable.String: Unsaved fleet changes detected. Do you want to save your fleet changes?

StringTable.Label: Crusade_Invasion_Tactic_Status_PlaceLegion
StringTable.String: Place your Legions - whomever controls the cities of %s at the end of the battle controls the world.

StringTable.Label: Crusade_Invasion_Tactic_Status_Surrender
StringTable.String: There are no defending legions remaining. The planet surrenders!

StringTable.Label: Crusade_Invasion_No_Defenders_Victory
StringTable.String: This planet has no defending legions. Victory is assured!

StringTable.Label: Crusade_Invasion_No_Defenders_Defeat
StringTable.String: Our planet has no defending legions. We must surrender!

StringTable.Label: HOTLOADING_GAME_DATA_DISABLED_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Hotloading game data has been disabled. You will need to restart to see your changes to data.

StringTable.Label: HOTLOADING_SCREEN_DATA_DISABLED_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Hotloading screen data has been disabled. You will need to restart to see your changes to the screens.

StringTable.Label: HOTLOADING_IN_PROGRESS_MESSAGE_DETAILED
StringTable.String: Hotloading in progress. You may experience some delay.

StringTable.Label: CANT_LEVEL_UP
StringTable.String: Can't level up until assigned to a planet.

StringTable.Label: ENABLED_TRANSFER_TAB
StringTable.String: Transfer citizens to planets to apply better modifiers!

StringTable.Label: MAINGAME_AGENT_NO_FACTION
StringTable.String: No Civilizations to spy on yet

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_NONE
StringTable.String: We know very little about the inner workings of this civilization.[BR][BR]Assign spies to learn more about their economy and start stealing technologies.

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_LOW
StringTable.String: Our spies have begun to collect information on both the Civilization and the economies of its colonies.[BR]We've also made initial contact with their lower level scientists who may be willing to 'share' their findings and technologies with us.

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_MEDIUM
StringTable.String: Our spies have worked further into government and corporate bureaucracy, providing more detailed information on the state of their economy.[BR]Their scientists now speak freely with our agents, increasing how quickly we acquire their technology.

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_HIGH
StringTable.String: We have deep knowledge of their forces and economy.[BR]Our spies have free access to their top research facilities and pass their latest advancements to us.

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_ULTRA
StringTable.String: We know them as well as they know themselves.[BR]Some of our spies are regarded as leading scientists and thinkers and freely pass secrets to us.

StringTable.Label: Abilities_Startup_Text
StringTable.String: Choose what ships you want your civilization to start with.

StringTable.Label: CustomFaction_Short_Dec
StringTable.String: Short description for AI Generation of Faction

StringTable.Label: Abilities_Race_Type_Text
StringTable.String: Biology affects what food your species uses and what planets you best adapt to.

StringTable.Label: Traits_Gendered_Units_Description
StringTable.String: If enabled, citizen's first names will be picked based on their gender. If no custom names are provided for the civilization, the default names will be used.

StringTable.Label: OPTIONS_BATTLEVIEWERDEBRIS_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Show dust and scenery objects in the battle viewer

StringTable.Label: TOTAL_SPIES_SELF_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Number of enemy spies currently assigned to your colonies.

StringTable.Label: CHOOSE_CITIZEN_PORTRAIT_INFOTEXT
StringTable.String: To use a custom portrait, create a 128x128 PNG image, then copy it here:

StringTable.Label: EDIT_CITIZEN_NAMES_LABEL
StringTable.String: Choose from existing Citizen Portraits or add your own custom portraits. You can also add your own custom Citizen names.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_ADVANTAGE_TOOLTIP_EVEN_MATCH
StringTable.String: You have a battle advantage of %lu vs. %lu, meaning your forces are pretty evenly matched.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_ADVANTAGE_TOOLTIP_PLAYER_SLIGHTLY_MORE_POWERFUL
StringTable.String: You have a battle advantage of %lu vs. %lu. Your soldiers are more powerful than your enemy.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_ADVANTAGE_TOOLTIP_PLAYER_MUCH_MORE_POWERFUL
StringTable.String: You have a battle advantage of %lu vs. %lu. Your soldiers are significantly more powerful than your enemy.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_ADVANTAGE_TOOLTIP_PLAYER_IS_ALOT_WEAKER
StringTable.String: You have a battle advantage of %lu vs. %lu. Your enemy's troops are significantly more powerful than yours. If retreat is still an option, you may want to consider it.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_ADVANTAGE_TOOLTIP_PLAYER_IS_WEAKER
StringTable.String: You have a battle advantage of %lu vs. %lu. Your enemy's troops are stronger than yours, so victory is uncertain.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_INVADING_LEGIONS
StringTable.String: The Legions of the invading forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_INVADING_GENERAL
StringTable.String: The General overseeing the invading forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_DEFENDING_GENERAL
StringTable.String: The General overseeing the defending forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_DEFENDING_LEGIONS
StringTable.String: The Legions of the defending forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_INVADING_SOLDIERS
StringTable.String: The number of invading soldiers (every legion represents 50,000 soldiers).

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_DEFENDING_SOLDIERS
StringTable.String: The number of the defending soldiers (every legion represents 50,000 soldiers).

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_SOLDIERING_YOURINVADING
StringTable.String: When engaging enemy forces, your troops will attack with +%lu%% strength.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_SOLDIERING_YOUHAVENONE
StringTable.String: Soldiering gives the invading forces a boost to their strength. Your troops do not receive a Soldiering bonus.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_SOLDIERING_ENEMYINVADING
StringTable.String: In this battle, enemy troops will attack at +%lu%% strength.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_SOLDIERING_ENEMYHAVENONE
StringTable.String: Soldiering gives the invading forces a boost to their strength. Your enemy does not receive Soldiering bonuses.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_YOURINVADING
StringTable.String: Once the invasion begins, your troops will get a +%lu%% strength boost when engaged with enemy forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_YOUHAVENONE
StringTable.String: Planetary Resistance traditionally gives the defending forces a boost to their strength. But your planet has no Resistance. Perhaps you should do something about that...

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_ENEMYINVADING
StringTable.String: Planetary Resistance gives the defending forces a +%lu%% strength boost.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_ENEMYHAVENONE
StringTable.String: Planetary Resistance traditionally gives the defending forces a boost to their strength. Luckilly, this planet has none, which will making the invasion somewhat easier.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_ENEMYNULLIFIED
StringTable.String: Planetary Resistance traditionally gives the defending forces a boost to their strength. Our chosen invasion strategy - %s - will fully nullify enemy resistance bonuses.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TACTIC_UNKNOWN
StringTable.String: Unknown Invasion Tactic - research further up the Tech Tree to unlock this attack strategy.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_TECH_ADVANTAGE_PLAYERLEADS
StringTable.String: 'Tech Advantage' is a boost to the strength of an army based on a civilization's progress down a tech tree. Your forces currently have an advantage of %lu to %lu over your enemy.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_TECH_ADVANTAGE_ENEMYLEADS
StringTable.String: 'Tech Advantage' is a boost to the strength of an army based on a civilization's progress down a tech tree. Your enemy is technologically superior, commanding an advantage of %lu to %lu over your troops.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_TECH_ADVANTAGE_EQUAL
StringTable.String: 'Tech Advantage' is a boost to the strength of an army based on a civilization's progress down a tech tree. Both you and your enemy are equally matched in this area.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_POPULATION
StringTable.String: The civilian population of the planet being invaded. Based on the Tactics used, this invasion may result in civilian casualties.

StringTable.Label: ALERT_PlayerKilledPlayer
StringTable.String: The %s has been destroyed by the %s

StringTable.Label: UNIT_PREREQ_NOT_MET
StringTable.String: You have not yet unlocked the technology to train in this specialization. Needed Technology: %s

StringTable.Label: RESEARCH_WND_FILTER_TOOLTIP_1
StringTable.String: Only show technologies related to improving your colonies.

StringTable.Label: RESEARCH_WND_FILTER_TOOLTIP_2
StringTable.String: Only show technologies that let you better explore the galaxy and extract its riches.

StringTable.Label: RESEARCH_WND_FILTER_TOOLTIP_3
StringTable.String: Only show technologies related to warfare.

StringTable.Label: RESEARCH_WND_FILTER_TOOLTIP_4
StringTable.String: Only show technologies related to diplomacy and influence - both foreign and domestic.

StringTable.String: Unreserved colony population is less than the minimum ship load

StringTable.Label: LOADING_STILLBUILDING_MAP
StringTable.String: I think I can...I think I can...
